price: De: “Əgər (müşriklərin) söylədikləri kimi Allahla yanaşı başqa məbudlar olsaydı, onlar Ərş Sahibinin yanına (çatmaq üçün) yol axtarardılar”.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُۥٓ ءَالِهَةٞ كَمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul law kāna maʿahu ālihatun kamā yaqūlūna idhan la-ib'taghaw ilā dhī al-ʿarshi sabīlan
